Message.Title: Yahoo's Marissa Mayer Is The 'Hottest CEO Ever.' And It's Great For Business
Message.Msg: Mayer, who’s long been considered one of the “sexiest geek girls” on the web, has been getting the royal treatment in the media since Monday’s announcement. Because of her gender, age and beauty she’s making the front pages of newspapers around the world (when Yahoo’s last CEO was given the job, he made the Times’ Business section instead). “Mayer has a far softer image,” writes Howard Kurtz on The Daily Beast. “And right now, the wow-she’s-a-lady tone is working to her advantage. She’s… a fresh and exciting choice.”

Message.Title: Three advices to Yahoo...
Message.Msg: Three advices to Yahoo... 1. Keep search top talents and patents. 2. Combine search, social network, news, sports, finance, email, videos, photo sharing etc. together by building a much better navigation tool (both on pc and mobile platform) between these websites. 3. Buy back shares from institutions instead of open market to save both parties some cost. Some institutions had been selling Yahoo for years. Now give them a way out.
